mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_commission_order ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, code, service_order_id, state, is_settle, is_deposit_user, school_id, student_code, user_id, adviser_id, official_id, is_studying, installment_num, installment, installment_due_date, start_date, end_date, tuition_fee, per_term_tuition_fee, receive_type_id, receive_date, per_amount, amount, expect_amount, discount, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, bonus_date, remarks, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{code}, #{serviceOrderId}, 'PENDING', #{isSettle}, #{isDepositUser}, #{schoolId}, #{studentCode}, #{userId}, #{adviserId}, #{officialId}, #{isStudying}, #{installmentNum}, #{installment}, #{installmentDueDate}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tuitionFee}, #{perTermTuitionFee}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{receiveDate}, #{perAmount}, #{amount}, #{expectAmount}, #{discount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{bonusDate}, #{remarks}, 0);
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, code, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, state, is_settle AS isSettle, is_deposit_user AS isDepositUser, school_id AS schoolId, student_code AS studentCode, user_id AS userId, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, is_studying AS isStudying, installment_num AS installmentNum, installment, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, tuition_fee AS tuitionFee, per_term_tuition_fee AS perTermTuitionFee, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, per_amount AS perAmount, amount, expect_amount AS expectAmount, discount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, bonus_date AS bonusDate, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_commission_order WHERE code = #{code};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, code, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, state, is_settle AS isSettle, is_deposit_user AS isDepositUser, school_id AS schoolId, student_code AS studentCode, user_id AS userId, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, is_studying AS isStudying, installment_num AS installmentNum, installment, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, tuition_fee AS tuitionFee, per_term_tuition_fee AS perTermTuitionFee, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, per_amount AS perAmount, amount, expect_amount AS expectAmount, discount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, bonus_date AS bonusDate, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_commission_order WHERE service_order_id = #{serviceOrderId};

SELECT co.id, co.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, co.code, co.service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, co.state, co.is_settle AS isSettle, co.is_deposit_user AS isDepositUser, co.school_id AS schoolId, co.student_code AS studentCode, co.user_id AS userId, co.adviser_id AS adviserId, co.official_id AS officialId, co.is_studying AS isStudying, co.installment_num AS installmentNum, co.installment, co.installment_due_date AS installmentDueDate, co.start_date AS startDate, co.end_date AS endDate, co.tuition_fee AS tuitionFee, co.per_term_tuition_fee AS perTermTuitionFee, co.receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, co.receive_date AS receiveDate, co.per_amount AS perAmount, co.amount, co.expect_amount AS expectAmount, co.discount, co.gst, co.deduct_gst AS deductGst, co.bonus, co.bonus_date AS bonusDate, co.remarks, co.is_close AS isClose, so.id AS serviceOrderId, so.gmt_create AS signingDate, so.subagency_id AS subagencyId, so.service_id AS serviceId FROM b_commission_order co, b_service_order so, tb_user u WHERE co.service_order_id = so.id AND co.user_id = u.id and co.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
